markdownRemark.html:
To me, 2018 was the year that VS Code really blew up in popularity. Suddenly social media was abuzz with people blogging about their setups and how in love they are.

So although I was trying to be a hardcore Atom lover, once Microsoft acquired Github I figured I might as well make the switch, because no one is nearly as obsessed with Atom like they are for Visual Studio Code and since now Microsoft owned both editors, I might as well switch to the preferred child.
